name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ZP Click 2 Call - Automated VRS Dialing

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on any 10-digit number on web pages to call using Z5 or P3.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension by ZP Better Together, LLC allows you to click on any phone number on any web page, which will start a VRS call. No more copy-and-paste!
